title: Artificial intelligence
summary: Artificial intelligence(AI) is the capability ofcomputational systemsto perform tasks typically associated withhuman intelligence, such aslearning,reasoning,problem-solving,perception, anddecision-making. It is afield of researchincomputer sciencethat develops and studies methods andsoftwarethat enable machines toperceive their environmentand uselearningandintelligenceto take actions that maximize their chances of achieving defined goals.[1]
